name: acrylic acid, 2-hydroxypropyl ester
Restrictions: SML expressed as the sum of acrylic acid, 2-hydroxypropyl ester and acrylic acid, 2-hydroxyisopropyl ester.It may contain up to 25 % (m/m) of acrylic acid, 2-hydroxyisopropyl ester (CAS No 0002918-23-2).
NotesCompliance: V1 Verification of compliance by residual content per food contact surface area (QMA) pending the availability of an analytical method.
ExpressedAs: As expressed as the sum of acrylic acid, 2-hydroxypropyl ester and acrylic acid, 2-hydroxyisopropyl ester
